participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and somewhat introverted, David is passionate about his family and finds comfort in food and gaming.
participant_1.background: I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat. I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. I have a dog named Max, and I love chocolate milk shakes. Recently, I went through a breakup.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and environmentally conscious, Emily is a music lover and enjoys spending time with her pets.
participant_2.background: I drive an old car to get to gigs, but I love my cats. I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees! I have 4 pets and enjoy training dogs.

content.text: I just got back from volunteering at my son's boy scout troop.
Oh nice! What did you do?
We went hiking and worked on their fire building skills.
Oh that sounds fun! I love hiking.
Me too! I also love chocolate milk shakes.
I love chocolate too! But milk shakes are a little too rich for me.
That's fair. My girlfriend just broke up with me so I've been on a chocolate milk shake binge.
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It's been rough. But I'm sure I'll be okay.
I'm sure you will too. Just give yourself some time.
Thanks. I appreciate it.
No problem. So what else do you like to do?
I love playing video games.
Oh cool! Me too! What's your favorite game?
I love Mortal Kombat.
I've never played it. But I've heard good things.
It's a lot of fun. You should give it a try.
I might have to.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to go to gigs.
Oh cool! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music. But I mostly go to rock and metal concerts.
Oh nice! I like those too!
We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be fun
